messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] lots of pets (was Therapy)
messages.msgSnippet: Tammy, My husbands Grandmother owns 35 acres , at one time it (the barn) was mostly used for race horses, there are still a few at the barn but mostly the
messages.messageBody:
Tammy,
My husbands Grandmother owns 35 acres , at one time it (the barn) was mostly
used for race horses, there are still a few at the barn but mostly the horses
are used for "pleasure riding" My aunt has just baught the property to avoid
inheritance taxes . She invited my hubby and I to take one of the trailers
that are on the property. I spend so much time there , this will make my life
much easier . Finally I will be able to cook a meal at home instead of
running around at supper time to feed my animals. Its tuff being the animal
lover. I think all of my life I have been getting the rolled eyes when I
bring a new injured or lost animal home. Even my daughter says " now mom, you
know daddy isnt gonna let you keep it." LOL even the kids yell at me. Anyway
I cant wait. Hubby is happy too as now he will be able to find me. I am
always on the go.
Tamie

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] lots of pets (was Therapy)
messages.msgSnippet: Tamilooch - where are you going to that there will be sooooo many 4 legged pets? Sounds like a wonderful place - I absolutely love all furries!
messages.messageBody:
Tamilooch - where are you going to that there will be sooooo many 4 legged pets?
Sounds like a wonderful place - I absolutely love all furries!
